column4: Howdy. I'm back. Sorry 'bout my absence. So yeah, x11 works. Nothing else. Switched to NV driver. That worked. Reinstalled nvidia drivers. That didn't fix it.
maybe you could use the nvidia driver with the gl output
My goal is to use vlc for this. Lemme try tweaking vlc to use that.
Hey! I can set vlc to use X11! Score one. :D
